org.jetel.component

Class CTLRecordGenerate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.ctl.CTLAbstractTransform
      • org.jetel.component.CTLRecordGenerate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordGenerate, Transform

    public abstract class CTLRecordGenerate
extends CTLAbstractTransform
implements RecordGenerate
    Base class of all Java transforms generated by CTL-to-Java compiler from CTL transforms in the DataGenerator component.
    See Also:
    RecordGenerate

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public final boolean init(java.util.Properties parameters,
           DataRecordMetadata[] targetMetadata)
                   throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Description copied from interface: RecordGenerate
        Initializes generate class/function. This method is called only once at the beginning of generate process. Any object allocation/initialization should happen here.
        Specified by:
        init in interface RecordGenerate
        Parameters:
        parameters - Global graph parameters and parameters defined specially for the component which calls this generate class
        targetMetadata - Metadata describing target data record
        Returns:
        True if OK, otherwise False
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException

      • initDelegate

        protected java.lang.Boolean initDelegate()
                                  throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Called by init(Properties, DataRecordMetadata[]) to perform user-specific initialization defined in the CTL transform. The default implementation does nothing, may be overridden by the generated transform class.
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException - if the initialization fails

      • generate

        public final int generate(DataRecord[] target)
                   throws TransformException
        Description copied from interface: RecordGenerate
        Performs generator of target records. This method is called as one step in generate flow of records.
        Specified by:
        generate in interface RecordGenerate
        Parameters:
        target - Target DataRecord
        Returns:
        RecordTransform.ALL -- send the data record(s) to all the output ports
        RecordTransform.SKIP -- skip the data record(s)
        >= 0 -- send the data record(s) to a specified output port
        < -1 -- fatal error / user defined
        Throws:
        TransformException

      • generateDelegate

        protected abstract java.lang.Integer generateDelegate()
                                               throws ComponentNotReadyException,
                                                      TransformException
        Called by generate(DataRecord[]) to generate user-specific data record defined in the CTL transform. Has to be overridden by the generated transform class.
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException - if some internal initialization failed
        TransformException - if an error occurred

      • generateOnError

        public int generateOnError(java.lang.Exception exception,
                  DataRecord[] target)
                    throws TransformException
        Description copied from interface: RecordGenerate
        Performs generator of target records. This method is called as one step in generate flow of records. Called only if RecordGenerate.generate(DataRecord[]) throws an exception.
        Specified by:
        generateOnError in interface RecordGenerate
        Parameters:
        exception - an exception that caused RecordGenerate.generate(DataRecord[]) to fail
        target - Target DataRecord
        Returns:
        RecordTransform.ALL -- send the data record(s) to all the output ports
        RecordTransform.SKIP -- skip the data record(s)
        >= 0 -- send the data record(s) to a specified output port
        < -1 -- fatal error / user defined
        Throws:
        TransformException

      • generateOnErrorDelegate

        protected java.lang.Integer generateOnErrorDelegate(java.lang.String errorMessage,
                                        java.lang.String stackTrace)
                                             throws ComponentNotReadyException,
                                                    TransformException
        Called by generateOnError(Exception, DataRecord[]) to generate user-specific data record defined in the CTL transform. May be overridden by the generated transform class. Throws UnsupportedOperationException by default.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - an error message of the error message that occurred
        stackTrace - a stack trace of the error message that occurred
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException - if some internal initialization failed
        TransformException - if an error occurred

      • signal

        public final void signal(java.lang.Object signalObject)
        Description copied from interface: RecordGenerate
        Method which can be used for signaling into generator that something outside happened.
        For example in aggregation component key changed.
        Specified by:
        signal in interface RecordGenerate
        Parameters:
        signalObject - particular data object - depends on concrete implementation

        Specified by:
        getSemiResult in interface RecordGenerate
        Returns:
